item.description:
Hi All...

Another Happy Hour and this time appetizers if you want at this really wonderful... and friendly... neighborhood Beacon Hill pub.

John, one of the barmen there says this place is very special. The place must be surrounded by good luck and karma. Over the years he's known over 60 couples who've met there and who eventually got married. Even last year a man walked in off the street and simply asked a woman the score of the baseball game and they're now engaged. The Sevens first opened its doors in 1933 and has been passing along good luck and karma ever since!

The Sevens - A Beacon Hill Pub
77 Charles St
Boston, MA 02114
(617) 523-9074

I hope to see you at the very lucky.... warm and cozy neighborhood pub at 7:00PM! Darts anyone?

Cheers,
Michael
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be under Mike/Meet up

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Happy Hour & Appetizers at a very lucky neighborhood pub! Darts anyone?
